docs.title: cellmark-schema
docs.text:
Schema for relating ontology classes to sets of markers via annotation properties

URI: https://example.org/cellmark

Name: cellmark-schema

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description Axiom An OWL axiom representing a marker set annotation Marker A specific marker that can be part of a marker set MarkerSet A named set of markers associated with an ontology class

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description annotated_property The annotation property being used annotated_source The source entity being annotated annotated_target The target of the annotation annotation_confidence Confidence score for an annotation axiom confidence_score Confidence score for the marker set or annotation derived_from_markers Indicates that a marker set name is derived from its component markers description has_marker_set Relates an ontology class to a marker set via annotation has_part Relates a marker set to its component markers id name precision Precision metric for the marker set recall Recall metric for the marker set

docs.title: Enumerations
docs.text: Enumeration Description

docs.title: Types
docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.title: Subsets
docs.text: Subset Description

docs.title: Class: Axiom
docs.text:
An OWL axiom representing a marker set annotation

URI: owl:Axiom

 classDiagram
    class Axiom
    click Axiom href "../Axiom"
      Axiom : annotated_property

      Axiom : annotated_source

      Axiom : annotated_target

      Axiom : annotation_confidence

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance annotated_source 1  Uriorcurie The source entity being annotated direct annotated_property 1  Uriorcurie The annotation property being used direct annotated_target 1  Uriorcurie The target of the annotation direct annotation_confidence 0..1  Float Confidence score for an annotation axiom direct

docs.title: Usages
docs.text: used by used in type used Axiom annotation_confidence domain Axiom

docs.title: Schema Source
docs.text: • from schema: https://example.org/cellmark

docs.title: Mappings
docs.text: Mapping Type Mapped Value self owl:Axiom native ms:Axiom

docs.title: Direct
docs.text:
name: Axiom
description: An OWL axiom representing a marker set annotation
from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
slots:
- annotated_source
- annotated_property
- annotated_target
- annotation_confidence
class_uri: owl:Axiom

docs.title: Induced
docs.text:
name: Axiom
description: An OWL axiom representing a marker set annotation
from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
attributes:
  annotated_source:
    name: annotated_source
    description: The source entity being annotated
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    slot_uri: owl:annotatedSource
    alias: annotated_source
    owner: Axiom
    domain_of:
    - Axiom
    range: uriorcurie
    required: true
  annotated_property:
    name: annotated_property
    description: The annotation property being used
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    slot_uri: owl:annotatedProperty
    alias: annotated_property
    owner: Axiom
    domain_of:
    - Axiom
    range: uriorcurie
    required: true
  annotated_target:
    name: annotated_target
    description: The target of the annotation
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    slot_uri: owl:annotatedTarget
    alias: annotated_target
    owner: Axiom
    domain_of:
    - Axiom
    range: uriorcurie
    required: true
  annotation_confidence:
    name: annotation_confidence
    description: Confidence score for an annotation axiom
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    domain: Axiom
    alias: annotation_confidence
    owner: Axiom
    domain_of:
    - Axiom
    range: float
    minimum_value: 0.0
    maximum_value: 1.0
class_uri: owl:Axiom

docs.title: Type: Jsonpath
docs.text:
A string encoding a JSON Path. The value of the string MUST conform to JSON Point syntax and SHOULD dereference to zero or more valid objects within the current instance document when encoded in tree form.

URI: xsd:string

  • base: str

  • uri: xsd:string

  • repr: str

docs.title: Schema Source
docs.text: • from schema: https://example.org/cellmark

docs.title: Type: Jsonpointer
docs.text:
A string encoding a JSON Pointer. The value of the string MUST conform to JSON Point syntax and SHOULD dereference to a valid object within the current instance document when encoded in tree form.

URI: xsd:string

  • base: str

  • uri: xsd:string

  • repr: str

    click Marker href "../Marker"
      Marker : description

      Marker : id

      Marker : name

docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance id 1  Uriorcurie direct name 1  String direct description 0..1  String direct

- id

docs.title: Induced
docs.text:
name: Marker
description: A specific marker that can be part of a marker set
from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
attributes:
  id:
    name: id
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    identifier: true
    alias: id
    owner: Marker
    domain_of:
    - Marker
    - MarkerSet
    range: uriorcurie
    required: true
  name:
    name: name
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    alias: name
    owner: Marker
    domain_of:
    - Marker
    - MarkerSet
    range: string
    required: true
  description:
    name: description
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    alias: description
    owner: Marker
    domain_of:
    - Marker
    - MarkerSet
    range: string

docs.title: Class: MarkerSet
docs.text:
A named set of markers associated with an ontology class

URI: ms:MarkerSet

 classDiagram
    class MarkerSet
    click MarkerSet href "../MarkerSet"
      MarkerSet : confidence_score

      MarkerSet : derived_from_markers

      MarkerSet : description

      MarkerSet : has_part

      MarkerSet : id

      MarkerSet : name

      MarkerSet : precision

      MarkerSet : recall

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance id 1  Uriorcurie direct name 1  String Name of the marker set, often derived from component marker names (e direct description 0..1  String direct has_part *  Uriorcurie Relates a marker set to its component markers direct derived_from_markers 0..1  Boolean Indicates that a marker set name is derived from its component markers direct confidence_score 0..1  Float Confidence score for the marker set or annotation direct precision 0..1  Float Precision metric for the marker set direct recall 0..1  Float Recall metric for the marker set direct

docs.title: Usages
docs.text: used by used in type used MarkerSet has_part domain MarkerSet MarkerSet derived_from_markers domain MarkerSet MarkerSet precision domain MarkerSet MarkerSet recall domain MarkerSet

docs.title: Schema Source
docs.text: • from schema: https://example.org/cellmark

docs.title: Mappings
docs.text: Mapping Type Mapped Value self ms:MarkerSet native ms:MarkerSet

docs.title: Direct
docs.text:
name: MarkerSet
description: A named set of markers associated with an ontology class
from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
slots:
- id
- name
- description
- has_part
- derived_from_markers
- confidence_score
- precision
- recall
slot_usage:
  name:
    name: name
    description: Name of the marker set, often derived from component marker names
      (e.g., "CD3+CD4+CD8+ T cell markers")
    required: true
rules:
- description: Marker set names should typically incorporate the names of component
    markers joined with '+' or similar notation when appropriate

docs.title: Induced
docs.text:
name: MarkerSet
description: A named set of markers associated with an ontology class
from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
slot_usage:
  name:
    name: name
    description: Name of the marker set, often derived from component marker names
      (e.g., "CD3+CD4+CD8+ T cell markers")
    required: true
attributes:
  id:
    name: id
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    identifier: true
    alias: id
    owner: MarkerSet
    domain_of:
    - Marker
    - MarkerSet
    range: uriorcurie
    required: true
  name:
    name: name
    description: Name of the marker set, often derived from component marker names
      (e.g., "CD3+CD4+CD8+ T cell markers")
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    alias: name
    owner: MarkerSet
    domain_of:
    - Marker
    - MarkerSet
    range: string
    required: true
  description:
    name: description
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    alias: description
    owner: MarkerSet
    domain_of:
    - Marker
    - MarkerSet
    range: string
  has_part:
    name: has_part
    description: Relates a marker set to its component markers
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    domain: MarkerSet
    slot_uri: BFO:0000051
    alias: has_part
    owner: MarkerSet
    domain_of:
    - MarkerSet
    range: uriorcurie
    multivalued: true
  derived_from_markers:
    name: derived_from_markers
    annotations:
      owl:
        tag: owl
        value: AnnotationProperty
    description: Indicates that a marker set name is derived from its component markers
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    domain: MarkerSet
    alias: derived_from_markers
    owner: MarkerSet
    domain_of:
    - MarkerSet
    range: boolean
  confidence_score:
    name: confidence_score
    description: Confidence score for the marker set or annotation
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    alias: confidence_score
    owner: MarkerSet
    domain_of:
    - MarkerSet
    range: float
    minimum_value: 0.0
    maximum_value: 1.0
  precision:
    name: precision
    description: Precision metric for the marker set
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    domain: MarkerSet
    alias: precision
    owner: MarkerSet
    domain_of:
    - MarkerSet
    range: float
    minimum_value: 0.0
    maximum_value: 1.0
  recall:
    name: recall
    description: Recall metric for the marker set
    from_schema: https://example.org/cellmark
    rank: 1000
    domain: MarkerSet
    alias: recall
    owner: MarkerSet
    domain_of:
    - MarkerSet
    range: float
    minimum_value: 0.0
    maximum_value: 1.0
rules:
- description: Marker set names should typically incorporate the names of component
    markers joined with '+' or similar notation when appropriate
